title: Household Essentials Wall-Mount Telescoping Indoor Clothes Drying Rack
features: Wall mountable indoor drying rack to hang your laundry on
8 adjustable plastic covered steel drying lines
description: When you need just a little bit more drying space without losing an inch of your floor, Household Essentials™ wall mount Telescoping Dryer is perfect. With its ability to extend and collapse back into itself, Household’s dryer gives you only the space you need without taking anything more. Extend the dryer up to 14.5", or use less depending on your need. Mount it in the bathroom and use it as a towel bar, then extend it to hold your hand washed delicates. Keep another in the laundry room for those occasional pieces. Its inconspicuous design makes it a suitable addition anywhere. With this wonderfully convenient extra space, you'll wonder how you ever did without.

Great for delicates, towels, swimwear, and winter accessories, this collapsible rack from The Clothes Line provides ample drying room without taking up floor space. Once attached to the wall with the included hardware, the rack telescopes in and out, providing one or as many as seven hanging bars. Not intended for heavy items, the unit is more than handy for lightweight ones plus, the plastic-coated steel bars dont snag clothes. Suitable for the kitchen, laundry room, or mud room, the rack measures 31-1/2 by 14-1/2 inches fully expanded.
